Title: Who won the first Biden-Trump presidential debate?
Description: Poll results from after the first 2024 presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump.

Title: Shark attacks man while he's fishing in Florida
Description: A man was fishing in Florida when a shark attacked him, severely injuring his arm, officials said.

Title: 4 dead after minivan crashes into nail salon: Authorities
Description: Four people were killed and nine others injured after a vehicle crashed into a storefront in New York on Friday, authorities said.

Title: Severe weather moving east this weekend: Latest forecast
Description: Severe storms ravaged the country from Montana to Florida on Thursday, with winds gusting to 91 mph in South Dakota.

Title: Orlando Cepeda, slugging Hall of Fame first baseman nicknamed 'Baby Bull,' dies at 86
Description: Orlando Cepeda, the slugging first baseman nicknamed “Baby Bull” who became a Hall of Famer among the early Puerto Ricans to star in the major leagues, has died

Title: Judge denies Alec Baldwin's bid to dismiss 'Rust' charge over firearm evidence
Description: Alec Baldwin's attorneys claimed the state destroyed key evidence -- the firearm in the shooting -- denying them the chance to review potentially exculpatory evidence.

Title: 3 million student loan borrowers to be placed in payment pause
Description: The pause would be very similar to the pandemic-era student loan moratorium – borrowers would not need to make payments and interest would not accrue.

Title: 8-year-old dies after mom allegedly left her in car during high heat to go to work
Description: Ashlee Stallings, 36, allegedly left her daughter in the vehicle "in hot weather conditions" and the 8-year-old suffered a fatal medical emergency, police said.

Title: Gaza aid piles up amid dispute over whether aid workers can carry security gear
Description: U.S. aid for Gaza is piling up because of a dispute between the U.S. and Israel over whether aid workers can carry protective gear and radios.

Title: Supreme Court dumps 40-year precedent in major blow to federal regulators
Description: The Supreme Court on Friday ruled to limit the power of federal regulatory agencies, upending a 40-year precedent widely known as the Chevron Doctrine.

Title: A harmless asteroid will whiz past Earth Saturday. Here's how to spot it
Description: An asteroid will whiz harmlessly past Earth this weekend

Title: Missouri governor vetoes school safety initiative to fund gun-detection systems
Description: Missouri Gov. Mike Parson has vetoed funding for a school safety initiative using gun-detection surveillance systems

Title: Can Biden bounce back from rough debate?
Description: Democrats described Joe Biden's debate performance Thursday as "wobbly," "disappointing" and a "disaster." Now, they're scrambling to figure out if he can bounce back.

Title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
Description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

Title: Martin Mull, comic and actor known for 'Clue,' 'Roseanne' and more, dead at 80
Description: Martin Mull, comic and actor known for "Clue," "Roseanne" and more, dead at 80.

Title: WATCH:  93-year-old woman with dementia lights up around her great-grandson
Description: A family shared this touching video on Tiktok showing a 93-year-old woman with dementia who traveled from the U.K. to Australia to meet her great-grandson.

Title: WATCH:  Cat who looked like she had no nose or lips completely transforms with new owners
Description: Miss Kitty had a hyper-allergic reaction to fleas, which severely distorted her face.

Title: WATCH:  Euro 2024 volunteer balances 9 beers on his head
Description: A volunteer at Euro 2024 demonstrated incredible skill, but not of the sporting variety, successfully stacking nine pints of beer on his head and walking around with them.

Title: WATCH:  No boat required: Kids wakeboard down flooded street in Louisiana
Description: Water-logged streets couldn't stop these kids in Louisiana from having fun — the pair proved there's no need for a boat to go wakeboarding.

Title: WATCH:  Hollywood's Walk of Fame set to add music royalty and award winners
Description: Big names in music, TV and film have been chosen to get stepped on. Prince joins actor Courtney B. Vance and TV science guy Bill Nye on the list of entertainers receiving Hollywood stars.

Title: WATCH:  This opera singer performs with a hip-hop flare
Description: Babatunde Akinboboye is a musician and performer who injects modern energy into his opera singing with hip-hop style.

Title: WATCH:  Orioles fan makes one-handed catch
Description: Tim Bryer made an amazing bare-handed catch from the upper deck during the Baltimore Orioles’ game against the Cleveland Guardians in Camden Yards.

Title: WATCH:  Family of bears pays surprise visit to NC family
Description: A North Carolina resident had an adorable surprise when a family of black bears climbed up onto his porch.

Title: WATCH:  Tourist defies warnings, jumps barrier at Yosemite waterfall
Description: A visitor to Yosemite National Park was captured on camera jumping a barrier at the top of the Vernal Falls and posing for a photo at the edge of the 317-foot drop.

Title: WATCH:  Endangered Amur tigers meet for 1st time at safari park
Description: Amur tiger pair Minerva and Dmitri met face-to-face for the first time at Woburn Safari Park this month in front of excited visitors.
